full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PHYAG DRUG MGON PO DKAR DMAR MTHING GSUM SGO NAS TSE BSOD 'GUGS PA'I THABS TSUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI GUNG AER KHE AA HAS RGYAL MTSAN ZHES BGYI BA BKAS 'DI @014B LTA BU ZHIG DGOS NAN TAN CHEN POS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I YAR KHRAL DU, RGYAL BA KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DZA YA PAndI TA 'AM MTSAN GZHAN NI BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA 'DI YIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
